name: Royoil Club Enthral Beard Oil (10ml)
description:
Enthral Beard Oil is made for every bearded or moustache wielding man! With a hint of Fruit with the KICK of the forest, best of all its great for your beard!

Royoil Club's beard oil is a well researched blend of 100% pure base oils and 100% pure essential oils, multivitamins as well as added Vitamin E that promotes hair growth, softens skin and hair, strengthens hair at the roots and moisturises skin and hair to prevent itchiness. 

INGREDIENTS: 
Sweet Almond(pure), Cedarwood (essential oil), Pine (essential oil), Sandalwood (essential oil), Tangerine (essential oil), Vitamin e (pure)


May contain traces of nuts. 

If you are prone to skin irritation we recommend using a small amount at first or seeking advice from your GP before use.

name: Royoil Club Moustache Wax (15ml)
description:
Tweak your Mo with a medium/firm hold with a scent so manly, that we would even present this to Chuck!

Using organic Cera Flava (bees wax) and blending it with the finest essential oils, our wax dries perfectly clear in your moustache,  with the added vitamins our wax will promote hair growth and keep hair strong to the roots!


INGREDIENTS: 
Cera Flava (Yellow bees wax),Clove(essential oil), Tangerine(essential oil), Organic Coconut Oil , Pure Vitamin E.

May contain Trace of nuts.

name: The Royoil Duo (Wax & Oil Package)
description:

name: Royoil Flush Set (Wax, Oil, two Kent combs)
description:
Royoil Flush set is a perfect gift for a gent or just a personal purchase containing our wax, beard with two Kent handmade finest combs for your beard, moustache and hair (81T Beard & Moustache /Slim jim hair comb)

Moustache wax: 15ml

Tweak your Mo with a medium/firm hold with a scent so manly, that we would even present this to chuck!

Using organic Cera Flava (bees wax) and blending it with the finest essential oils, our wax dries perfectly clear in your moustache,  with the added vitamins our wax will promote hair growth and keep hair strong to the roots!


INGREDIENTS: 
Cera Flava (Yellow bees wax),Clove(essential oil), Tangerine(essential oil), Organic Coconut Oil , Pure Vitamin E.

May contain Trace of nuts.

Beard Oil: 10ml

Enthral Beard Oil is made for every bearded or moustache wielding man! With a hint of Fruit with the KICK of the forest, best of all its great for your beard!

Royoil Club's beard oil is a well researched blend of 100% pure base oils and 100% pure essential oils, multivitamins as well as added Vitamin E that promotes hair growth, softens skin and hair, strengthens hair at the roots and moisturises skin and hair to prevent itchiness. 

INGREDIENTS: 
Sweet Almond(pure), Cedarwood (essential oil), Pine (essential oil), Sandalwood (essential oil), Tangerine (essential oil), Vitamin e (pure)


May contain traces of nuts. 

If you are prone to skin irritation we recommend using a small amount at first or seeking advice from your GP before use. 

Kent Comb 81T:

Kent's Moustache & Beard combs are fine hand made combs not just your ordinary plastic injection moulded combs, Kent combs will not damage your hairs, excellent for combing our moustache wax right to the tips of your Mo or combing your beard after using our Enthral beard oil.

Kent Slim Jim Hair Comb:

Kent's Slim Jim comb is a fine hand made comb, don't settle for plastic injection moulded hair combs.
Perfect for styling your hair and fits straight into your pocket. Splendid!

name: KENT MG2 PURE BRISTLE BRUSH (ALL HAIR)
description:
Kent MG2 Wooden Grip / Black Bristle - Manly as Hell! 

Oval - Beech wood, with pure black bristle

Kent MG2 pure bristle brush is used for all types of hair, It is very gentle to the skin and hair making the least damage to any of your precious beard hairs, it also Increase's blood flow to your hair follicles, distributes  the oils from your scalp and facial hair naturally, Keeping all of your facial hair healthy, perfect to use with our beard oil and also it feels great while brushing, very relaxing.

name: KENT MOUSTACHE & BEARD COMB 81T
description: Kent's Moustache & Beard combs are fine hand made combs not just your ordinary plastic injection moulded combs, Kent combs will not damage your hairs, excellent for combing our moustache wax right to the tips of your Mo or combing your beard after using our Enthral beard oil.

description:

Perfect for styling your hair and fits straight into your pocket. Splendid!

name: Royoil Club Moustache Wax - Twin Pack (15ml)
description:
Twin Pack of the Royoil Club's Moustache Wax.

Tweak your Mo with a medium/firm hold with a scent so manly, that we would even present this to chuck!

Using organic Cera Flava ( bees wax ) and blending it with the finest essential oils, our wax dries perfectly clear and with the added vitamins it will promote hair growth and keep them strong to their roots!
